mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST_PATIENT (PACT_ID, PT_NO, PT_NM, SEX_TP_CD, PT_BRDY_DT, HSP_TP_CD, IDX_DT, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE) VALUES (#{pactId}, #{ptNo}, #{ptNm}, #{sexTpCd}, #{ptBrdyDt}, #{hspTpCd}, #{idxDt}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDate}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{lastModifiedDate});
